channel.title: Copy to Different Locations on
channel.description: Recent content in Copy to Different Locations on

item.title: Project: Shantz Copy Basket (Compatible with linux as well as windows)
item.description: I’m sure you have copied/moved files on your computer from one place to another. And I’m sure often you have to do more than just “single-shot” copying that is copy a few files to one place, move a few to another, and copy yet some more to one more location. Well, I had to do this quite a few times (e.g. I ran out of disk space recently on a partition and had to empty out my “Movies” and “Songs” folders to move a few movies/songs each to all other partitions/disks according to the space available).
